name: Sklearn Random Forest Regression
description: Random Forest Regression, fits a number of classifying decision trees on various sub-samples of the dataset and uses averaging to improve the predictive accuracy and control over-fitting. The sub-sample size is controlled with the max_samples parameter if bootstrap=True (default), otherwise the whole dataset is used to build each tree.

fields.name: targetCol
fields.title: Target Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: featureCols
fields.title: Feature Columns
fields.description: Feature columns of type - all numeric, boolean and vector

fields.name: n_estimators
fields.title: Number of Estimators
fields.description: Specifies the number of trees in the forest.

fields.name: criterion
fields.title: Criterion
fields.description: The function to measure the quality of a split.

fields.name: max_depth
fields.title: Max Depth
fields.description: The maximum depth of the tree. If not set, nodes are expanded until all leaves are pure or until all leaves contain less than min_samples_split samples.

fields.name: min_samples_split
fields.title: Min Samples Split
fields.description: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node. Higher values prevent a tree from growing too complex.

fields.name: min_samples_leaf
fields.title: Min Samples Leaf
fields.description: The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

fields.name: min_weight_fraction_leaf
fields.title: Min Weight Fraction Leaf
fields.description: The minimum weighted fraction of the sum total of weights required to be at a leaf node.

fields.name: max_features
fields.title: Max Features
fields.description: The number of features to consider when looking for the best split.

fields.name: max_leaf_nodes
fields.title: Max Leaf Nodes
fields.description: Grow trees with max_leaf_nodes in best-first fashion. If not set, then unlimited number of leaf nodes.

fields.name: min_impurity_decrease
fields.title: Min Impurity Decrease
fields.description: A threshold for early stopping in tree growth. A node will split if its impurity is above the threshold, otherwise it is a leaf.

fields.name: bootstrap
fields.title: Bootstrap
fields.description: Whether bootstrap samples are used when building trees.

fields.name: oob_score
fields.title: Oob Score
fields.description: Whether to use out-of-bag samples to estimate the R^2 on unseen data.

fields.name: random_state
fields.title: Random State
fields.description: Controls the randomness of the bootstrapping of the samples used when building trees (if bootstrap=True). Default value is None

fields.name: warm_start
fields.title: Warm Start
fields.description: When warm_start is true, the existing fitted model attributes an are used to initialise the new model in a subsequent call to fit.
